value.name: Policeman accused of star’s murder said he was ‘terrified’ before firing Taser
value.description: Pc Benjamin Monk denies the murder and manslaughter of ex-Premier League striker Dalian Atkinson. A policeman accused of murdering Dalian Atkinson told investigators he was “absolutely terrified” and felt his brain had stopped working before he tasered the ex-footballer to the ground,

value.name: Dalian Atkinson trial: Pc accused of murder ‘was so terrified, he felt his brain wasn’t working’
value.description: Officer told investigators that footballer was ‘hell bent’ on injuring him and that he had no recollection of Tasering him for 33 seconds

value.name: Policeman accused of Atkinson murder 'terrified' before firing Taser
value.description: A policeman accused of murdering Dalian Atkinson told investigators he was "absolutely terrified" before firing a Taser at the former footballer, a court heard Thursday.
